text: (Yudaya kyoto ya kirisutokyoto-tachi ni) itte yaru ga i. `Anata gata wa, arra ni tsuite watashi-tachi to rongi suru no ka, kare wa watashi-tachi no omodeari, mata anata gata no omode ara reru. Watashi-tachi ni wa watashi-tachi no okonai ga ari, anata gata ni wa anata gata no okonai ga aru. Watashi-tachi wa, kare ni makoto o tsukushimasu
